评论详情: Bought this wig for Halloween. loved. loved. loved. good quality and thick.
Got this for a 60s party

I loved the quality of this wig.  The hair was very thick.  For our family Christmas, everyone wears funny hair and strange sunglasses for pictures. We have great fun laughing at each other.  This wig was a favorite.
Didn’t like this at all. The big bump in the front is so obvious but I did use it for a Halloween costume so I guess I got one good use out of it
Great quality wig

Purchased this for a halloween costume party and was pleasantly surprised by the quality. My hair is thick and just past my shoulders and I had no problem putting it up under the wig (i did use a nylon wig cap). I danced all night and the wig stayed secure.

评论概述: Heed the box that states "Frequently Returned Item."
评论详情: I bought this wig because this was the total style I was going for as we were going to a Motown Musical. I also thought this would be WAY easier than doing my own hair. What you see in the picture is NOT what came out of the package. These are the instructions: "Take wig out from the package, shake it lightly to release the default style." NOT true at all. Out of the package, the flip was under and not up. (The hair color and bouffant part of the wig were great! That's why it gets the 2 stars.) This did not change no matter how many times I shook it. Tried a curling iron to get it to flip up; tried Velcro rollers and hairspray to get it to flip up. Still flipped under. SO DISAPPOINTED with this. A total waste of my money and time. I DO NOT recommend.

评论概述: Decent Wig for 80s Costume but Could Be Better
评论详情: I recently wore this wig for an 80s-themed Halloween party, and it did the job fairly well. The style of the wig is spot on for that retro look, and it definitely added a fun, nostalgic touch to my costume.  The wig was relatively easy to put on and stayed in place throughout the night, which was a big plus. The bangs and beehive shape were well-constructed, giving it that iconic 80s flair.  However, the quality of the wig could use some improvement. The hair fibers felt a bit stiff and unnatural, which made it look less realistic. It had a very shiny look to it.  Overall, it's a decent option for a costume or themed party, but don't expect it to hold up to regular use or high expectations of realism.
I used this wig for a show and love it. It’s like a powder pink and fit great with a wig band. I have a large head so this was perfect.

I felt like a hot mess jersey shore lady in this wig. I was hoping for a cute Jackie Kennedy vibe for Halloween and couldn’t bare to at this on me for more than a sec. The top poof is much more wilder than pictured.

评论概述: Perfect easy wig for Ginger costume
评论详情: I was looking for an easy affordable wig to wear for my Ginger from Gilligan’s Island costume. This wig was very easy to put on and keep on. I received a lot of compliments the night I wore it. It felt nice and held up well.
used this for a halloween party. with a polka dot headband added. most of my friends did not recognize me. This was surprisingly comfortable to wear all evening on a warm night.

评论概述: Perfect for my B-Movie Martian Costume!
评论详情: While it took a little bit to figure out the correct way to arrange the hair (and how to keep my antennae from falling forward), it worked perfectly for my Martian costume and even helped the whole ensemble to take first place for most creative costume. The hair was really soft and of high quality. There was of course a little shedding as with any wig but not nearly as bad as other wigs I've purchased. The color was perfectly silver for my needs and really completed the look o was going for.
The wig is good quality & feels very nice.  It was exactly as I expected it to be.

评论概述: Perfect for Halloween with a Few Touch-ups
评论详情: The wig was perfect for my Halloween party! When I first opened it, the bangs were a bit deformed, so I had to wet them and restyle by using clips to curl them. I let them dry, then added a headband to hide some of the imperfections. Overall, I was happy with the final look.
This is a surprisingly nice wig for being a novelty item. Thick, heavy, silky. Recommended!
I was MaryAnn on Gilligans Island. Hubby was the professor. Fun wig. Will wear for costume parties again.
Worked great for my costume.
This wig was high quality! I was very pleased with it and it was perfect for the intended purpose.

This wig has great volume and shape to it. I had to trim the bangs slightly to fit me, but other than that— love it!! I keep it stored on a wig stand just to hold its shape. Very great quality and think it’s a good price for what it is. Would buy another if I ever needed it!
Great wig for 6Os party. Amazing quality.
It was fun to wear for a Gilligan Island night!  Wont let me upload pics. Sorry!
Buying two so I have a backup. Perfect alien babe wig.

Thank you!  Wig arrived exactly as advertised for our church skit.  Advice for future customers ... all wigs have the tendency to itch because of the materials they are made from.  So, if you buy any wig, also buy a inexpensive wig cap to put on your hair under the wig.  Hope this helps!
Not sure if it’s an everyday wearable, but looks amazing. Feels comfortable and perfect for a 60s themed party!
Great product for the price. Arrived quickly and exactly as described. I highly recommend.

I picked this up as part of my Halloween costume to replace the first one I purchased that more than a little rough. This one looked great! Hair fibers looked pretty natural and it was easy enough to style. I cannot speak to it's longevity as I wore it about 16 hours total and probably won't wear it again anytime soon. If you are looking for a retro style costume wig, this one is great.
It is great

OMG, this wig was fabulous! So much so that people thought it was my real hair, lol. It was comfortable and stayed on through dancing! If you're looking for a wig for a themed party or costume, this is the wig for you! I may have missed it in the description originally, but the wig does come with a hair cap. Highly recommend!!
This was supringly good for the price. I expected a cheap mess and this is a full wig with good volume. Great for costumes
I’m going to be returning this. It’s so big and silly looking.
